Class calculator.BitWise

  • java.lang.Object
    • calculator.BitWise

  • public class calculator.BitWise
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is use for handle a Bitwise operator ( and , or , xor , bit wise inversion , left - right shift )

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      calculator.BitWise() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) int bitwiseInversion(int a)
      This method is use for find the inversion for a integer value.
      It convert a parameter to 2nd complement.
      (package private) int leftShift(int a, int b)
      This method is use for find a new value of parameter A in binary after left shift b time.
      (package private) int logicalAND(int a, int b)
      This method is use for find the Binary AND with between 2 integer.
      The OR operator compares each binary digit of two integers and gives back 1 if either of them is 1.
      (package private) int logicalOR(int a, int b)
      This method is use for find the Binary OR with between 2 integer.
      The AND operator compares each binary digit of two integers and gives back 1 if both are 1, otherwise it returns 0.
      (package private) int logicalXOR(int a, int b)
      This method is use for find the Binary XOR with between 2 integer.
      The XOR operator compares each binary digit of two integers and gives back 1 if both the compared bits are different.
      (package private) int rightShift(int a, int b)
      This method is use for find a new value of parameter A in binary after right shift b time.
